name: Not all duels are fair
description:
Game entry for the Spain Game Devs Jam II  by Alec Lafita and Marc Palomar.

Hope you enjoy your stay!

Controls:
- Controller: Rt to use cooldown. Lt to move slower.
- Mouse&keyboard: WASD. SPACE/LMouse use cooldown. Shift/RMouse move slower.

Contact:
alec.lafita@gmail.com (Game developer)
marc.palomar.soler@gmail.com (Game developer)

Music:
8bit music adaptation of the metal band Expel The Grace:
https://www.instagram.com/expelthegrace/
